Introducing OCBC OneLook - we've updated the app to work with iPhone X's Face ID feature, so you can log in securely to access your OCBC accounts, with just a glance at your new iPhone X.

We've also fixed the issues that caused some users difficulty in accessing features under "More Services", payments and transfers.

Now you can carry out transactions in a wide range of major currencies from a single platform. Simply open a foreign currency account online, wherever you are.

You can also transfer funds from a Foreign Currency account to any OCBC savings or current account, or transfer funds overseas or even place a Time Deposit.

Psst! Check out our latest feature to make banking magical.

Now you can bank safely and seamlessly anywhere, everywhere with just a few swipes and taps. No more worrying about bringing your physical token or the hassle of keying in your SMS OTP.

Introducing OCBC OneToken: Authenticate all banking transactions and services securely with just your mobile phone. No physical token or SMS OTPs needed.

Activate OCBC OneToken now to experience the magic!

More than banking, now you can learn how to achieve financial wellness with WealthView on OCBC Mobile Banking app. View all your wealth and financial information at a glance and access our financial planning journeys to calculate exactly how much you need to reach your life goals, be it protection or planning ahead for your future.
What's more, you can consolidate all your financial information across banks and government institutions so you can see the full picture of your financial situation that helps you make smarter decisions about managing your money.

Additionally, never forget a bill with reminders on upcoming payments and access banking and lifestyle needs easily by viewing all your credit card spends, balances & rewards points in one place.
• View your pending card transactions in real time
• Get a complete and organized view of your finances in one place
• Receive reminders a week before payment is due

Embark on your smart money management journey today by updating to the new OCBC Mobile Banking app, available in Chinese as well.
